scripts.serve: gulp images & npm run compile && bundle exec jekyll serve --unpublished --future --config=_config.yml,_config_dev.yml
scripts.preview: gulp images & npm run compile && bundle exec jekyll serve --strict_front_matter --config=_config.yml,_config_dev.yml
scripts.build: gulp images & npm run compile && bundle exec jekyll build --config=_config.yml,_config_prod.yml
scripts.publish: gulp images && npm run purge && npm run build && s3_website push
